cause.description:
The British National Union of Journalists and the University and College Union, two British organizations have decided to boycott Israel and to boycott all Israeli teachers,researchers... You must sign also the ADL's petition on this link: http://support.adl.org/site/PageServer?JServSessionIdr011=m47apsci13.app8b&pagename=britishboycottofisrael http://www.adl.org/boycott (British boycott of Israel -Homepage) If you've a website and/or blog you must view this page in order to add ADL's ads on your website/blog: http://www.adl.org/boycott/boycott_ads.asp
1. Against antisemitism
2. Stop British boycott of Israel
3. Support Israel
cause.mission: Stop British Academic and Journalistic boycott of Israel
cause.name: Stop the academic and journalistic boycott of Israel
